channel.title: Hyperion #474 - Farming
channel.description:
[ul][center][b][u][Hyperion 474] RuneUnlimited V2.0[/center] [center][b][u]Farming Development[/center] [center][b][u]Follow the Development: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,471251.0.html
[b][u]Progression[/u][/b] [list] [li]All global Farming Patch's working, and interctable.[/li] [li]All Farming data gathered, I have everything needed to get started.[/li] [li]Farming.java; loads all related things to do with Farming. Farming = biggest pain in the ass ever.[/li] [li]Proper timing, for every plantable seed/herb/etc..[/li] [li]All Farming shops, including the Tool Lepracaun, which sells all farming utilities![/li] [li]Identified all Farming Animations, GFX's, Items, NPC's, and Objects.[/li] [/list]
[b][u]Benchmark[/u][/b] I recently started coding the main Farming class. Basically it loads like this:[/ul] [code]public static enum PlantableSeeds { // below, a list of all plantable seeds for EVER category.[/code] [code]MARRENTILL(201, 251, 5, 3.8) // ID of seed, EXP given for planting, level required, experience granted.[/code] [code]public void addGlobalObject { // adds an object 2-seconds after player has planted seed.[/code] [code]addGlobalObject(####, ####, ####, #) // object ID, object X, object Y, object Height.[/code]
If you have any suggestions, or an idea that you think would be good, feel free to post.

item.title: Hyperion #474 - Farming
item.dc:creator: @Python1 Python_
item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

Mind posting source code?

Nothing is written at the moment, basically just the outline. I need to finish my ItemOnObject handler before I do anymore. That way, I can basically make it load all the seeds. The seeds will he identified as seed 1, seed 2, seed 3, and so on. It will say, seed 1 (herb seed) used in patch 1 (herb patch) send Anim, add skill xp, la la la, than starts a timer in which the her will grow. Than it’s just a matter of picking the item off of the ground :P.

That’s it in simplest form, it looks better than it sounds.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion #474 - Farming
item.dc:creator: @Python1 Python_
item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

[ul][center][b][u][Hyperion 474] RuneUnlimited V2.0[/center]
[center][b][u]Farming Development[/center]
[center][b][u]Follow the Development: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,471251.0.html

Progression
[list]
[li]All global Farming Patch’s working, and interctable.[/li]
[li]All Farming data gathered, I have everything needed to get started.[/li]
[li]Farming.java; loads all related things to do with Farming. Farming = biggest pain in the ass ever.[/li]
[li]Proper timing, for every plantable seed/herb/etc…[/li]
[li]All Farming shops, including the Tool Lepracaun, which sells all farming utilities![/li]
[li]Identified all Farming Animations, GFX’s, Items, NPC’s, and Objects.[/li]
[/list]

Benchmark
I recently started coding the main Farming class. Basically it loads like this:[/ul]

public static enum PlantableSeeds { // below, a list of all plantable seeds for EVER category.
MARRENTILL(201, 251, 5, 3.8) // ID of seed, EXP given for planting, level required, experience granted.
public void addGlobalObject { // adds an object 2-seconds after player has planted seed.
addGlobalObject(####, ####, ####, #) // object ID, object X, object Y, object Height.

If you have any suggestions, or an idea that you think would be good, feel free to post.
